author: aldcroft
description: Description: Module collection for statistical inference in the physical sciences.Homepage URL: http://inference.astro.cornell.edu/Version: 0.4"The inference package is a collection of Python modules implementing a variety of methods targeting the statistical inference problems—and the statistical modeling style—of the physical sciences."Library Modules: count, drxn, gauss, montecarlo, kepler, cosmology, deriv, grid, integrate
title: Inference
